name: Random Runners
description:
The Random Heroes crew is back for more fun!

Random Runners is a spin on the Random Heroes game in runner fashion! Play as a misfit group of heroes on their run-and-gun adventure taking on the most cliché bad guys ever, zombies!

Choose your character, choose your weapon, and give 'em hell! Featuring both level based and endless gameplay mode, you can compete for high scores on the global leaderboards.

Features
-------
- 45 Levels
- 3 Worlds
- Endless mode
- 26 Characters (with unique stats)
- 11 Weapons
- Widescreen support
- Leaderboards
- Achievements
